item.title: PLUG
item.description: score:26 Chances: Plug Power has continued to show growth and expansion in the alternative energy technology market. The installation of electrolyzer systems at Amazon fulfillment centers shows potential for increased usage of hydrogen fuel cell-powered vehicles. The company’s focus on comprehensive hydrogen solutions for the green hydrogen economy positions it well for future growth.
